name: Carrot Cake Smoothie
description: Start your day with all the warming, comforting spices you crave in a carrot cake! Streamline breakfast by prepping the carrots and banana the night before so, come morning, all you have to do is blend. You won’t believe this smoothie has a full serving of veggies!

ingredients.name: carrots
ingredients.additionalInstruction: chopped, steamed, and chilled in advance

ingredients.name: almond milk
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or ½ cup each plain Greek yogurt and almond milk

preparation: In a blender, combine all ingredients. If you like it thicker, add ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add water. Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass.
tips: Freeze almond milk or yogurt as ice cubes ahead of time to help keep the smoothie icy cold when blending and provide a thicker consistency.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 slice whole-grain bread and 1 tsp nut butter.
